channel.title: How do you change emotes to teleports?
channel.description:
I have seen many servers with their teleports in place of their emotes. So how do I change that? I know I go to Clickingmost.java but I do not know how to edit it into a teleport. Not the new emote page; the old one. Like this: [IMG]http://i883.photobucket.com/albums/ac38/Summer_Snow1200/emotestoteleports.jpg[/img]
thx

item.title: How do you change emotes to teleports?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:10, topic:340474”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=436844.msg3210778#msg3210778 date=1274223797]
my client does “toX” and “toY” so I would just delete emote code and under the clicking code I put co’ors?
[/quote]
That’s exactly correct.[/quote]
ok tyvm

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change emotes to teleports?

item.title: How do you change emotes to teleports?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

If the specific case label under the clicking most packet (packet 185) contains any code regarding the emote (or invokes a method; in which case you should take a look at that method) then change it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change emotes to teleports?

item.title: How do you change emotes to teleports?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

you add this under the click id or w/e

ToX = 1000; ToY = 1000;
or

TeleportX = 1000; TeleportY = 1000;
or TeleX = 1000; TeleY = 1000;
depends on your source.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change emotes to teleports?

item.title: How do you change emotes to teleports?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:4, topic:340474”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=436844.msg3210028#msg3210028 date=1274147729]
Qiux stop spamming…
And if your using a deltascape source, then yes its in clickingMost.java. You would find the action button id, and edit it to teleport when clicked on. If you dont understand how to do this, just post here.
[/quote]

that’s the thing; I found in Clickingmost.java but how do I change it from emote to teleport?[/quote]
I don’t think it’s in the ClickingMost class, tbh. I’m not sure what packet it’s in either in the client class, but once you find it, just edit all the cases.

Read full topic
